Configuration

One file. Infinite services.

Describe your entire infrastructure in a single digi.toml. Services, databases, queues, and routing ‚Äî all versioned alongside your code.

‚úìGit-tracked infrastructure
‚úìPer-branch preview environments
‚úìZero-downtime rollouts
‚úìInstant rollback with one command
digi.toml
toml
# digi.toml ‚Äî full stack in 20 lines
¬†
[project]
name = "my-api"
region = "auto"
¬†
[services.api]
image = "./api"
port = 3000
scale = { min = 1, max = 20 }
¬†
[databases.db]
type = "postgres"
version = "16"
¬†
[caches.cache]
type = "redis"
